title: Never Say Never: Mark Cavendish Keeps Us Hanging as He Refuses to Confirm His Retirement
content:
'We'll see what happens in the future': Cavendish floats possibility of another season in the pro peloton following new all-time Tour de France record.

Read the full article at Never Say Never: Mark Cavendish Keeps Us Hanging as He Refuses to Confirm His Retirement on Velo.
author: sstokes
